Name: Javva Juice
About the game: Adventure little wizard named Javva, looking for his Coffee stolen by evil skeleton King. Enjoy challenging gameplay - then Javva Juice for you! Here you have to work hard to be like before you go through the next dungeon! Many clever enemies and treacherous traps will prevent you collect treasures, and the flying brains again and again send you to respawn!
